item.title: #TIL : Use NGINX as a TCP,UDP load balancer
item.description: Use NGINX as a TCP,UDP load balancer NGINX is well known as a simple and good web server right now, but not everyone knows that NGINX can act like a TCP-UDP loadbalancer.

item.title: Webfonts Optimization Using Nginx
item.description: Context Everytime you decided to use a webfont on your web, you think about Google Web Fonts, which is the best CDN for webfonts at this moment.
